name: A Summation of Interest
description: When your Charlotte, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters uses a Normal Attack: If your opponent has a character on the field with Snappy Silhouette attached, heal your active character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When your $[A1110], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters uses a Normal Attack: If your opponent has a character on the field with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111101]</color> attached, heal your active character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When your Charlotte, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters uses a Normal Attack: If your opponent has a character on the field with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Snappy Silhouette</color> attached, heal your active character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
